TextView.android:text: PREVENTIVE MAINTENANCE SCHEDULE- PRE MONSOON (INLUS EAST)
a) Check for Cracks in the Antenna structure
b) Check for rust on Reflector Surface
c) Check for rust on Support Structure
d) Cable & Connectors Checked for Moisture & Loose Sheaths
e) Azimuth & Elevation Motor power supply connectors
g) Greasing of Azimuth/Elevation Motors & Azimuth/Elevation screw jack
i) Condition of C-Band LNA Enclosure
a) Check for rust on Reflector Surface
b) Check for rust on Support Structure
c) Cable & Connectors Checked for Moisture & Loose Sheaths
d) Condition of L1 & L5 LNA Enclosure
e) Check for any damage in antenna cable conduit
a) Physical check for any damage
b) Cable & Connectors Checked for Moisture & Loose Sheaths
d) Check for any damage in antenna cable conduit
a) Check for Water logging at Rooftop & surrounding areas
b) Check for Gaps to Prevent Dust, Reptiles, Rodents & Air Conditioning Leakage etc.
c)Check all equipment cabinet/shelter for leakage of water and accumulation of moisture
d) Check area surrounding the equipment room & antenna are clear and free from long grass, bushes etc.
a) Physical Check 11mtr Antenna Lightening arrester Earthing connection
b) Physical Check 3mtr Antenna Lightening arrester Earthing connection
c) Physical Check OMNI Antenna Lightening arrester Earthing connection
d) Cleaning or Brazing of all Earthing Strip Joints (if necessary)
No Water Leakage & Accumulation of Moisture
Clear & Free from grass, bushes etc.
